sentences.en: Additional test results also indicate that the new hydrogen maser atomic clock onboard GIOVE-B is working correctly.
sentences.cn: 此外，测试结果还表明GIOVE-B携带的氢微波激射器原子钟运转良好。

sentences.en: Discusses a variety of thermodynamic and systematic processes that can affect maser microwave Cavity frequency.
sentences.cn: 讨论影响氢钟谐振腔频率的各种热动力学过程.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to specify maser amplifier, laser or laser generator.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击可指定为微波激射器放大器 、 激光器或激光发生器.

sentences.en: Frequency of the occurance of water maser source in different outflows were given.
sentences.cn: 给出水脉泽源在不同外流中出现的频度.

sentences.en: General maser symbol. Maser amplifier, laser or laser generator can be specified.
sentences.cn: 常规微波激射器符号. 可指定微波激射器放大器 、 激光器或激光发生器.

sentences.en: His discoveries, which won him the Nobel prize, led to the caesium atomic clock and the hydrogen maser.
sentences.cn: 这一获得诺贝尔奖的发现产生了铯原子钟和氢微波激射器。

sentences.en: Maser said Leo Raubal long considered such a lawsuit before his death in 1979.
sentences.cn: 马泽说,雷欧劳巴尔于1979年去世,此前他一直在考虑就此事提起诉讼.

sentences.en: Miniature passive hydrogen maser is developed at Shanghai Observatory cavity design and square wave frequency modulation.
sentences.cn: 介绍了上海天文台被动型小氢钟的设计和研制,给出了初步的测试结果.

sentences.en: The atomic hydrogen maser is the most stable frequency standard allshortest measuring time interval.
sentences.cn: 氢脉泽是一种中、长期稳定度最高的原子频率标准.

sentences.en: The other design , the passive maser, uses the atomic resonance as a narrow bandpass amplifier.
sentences.cn: 被动型氢钟的激射器工作在振荡阈值之下,其作用与谐振放大器相似.

sentences.en: The plasma wave nonlinear effect of IonChannel Electron Cyclotron Maser ( ICECM ) is investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了离子通道回旋电子束脉塞 ( ICECM ) 中的等离子体波非线性效应.

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that produces a very powerful electric force
